extension.summary: Weather forecasting and radar images for Australia using Bureau of Meteorology data
extension.description: Weather forecast data scraped from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology www.bom.gov.au. For full features (e.g. animated radar) and make sure you install the replacement skin files - see information at the addon wiki (https://kodi.wiki/index.php?title=Add-on:Oz_Weather).
extension.disclaimer: Use of this addon implies you agree to the following terms and conditions - http://reg.bom.gov.au/other/copyright.shtml and http://reg.bom.gov.au/other/disclaimer.shtml
extension.news: V2.0.0 - Note - addon must be reconfigured to work!! - Add startup screen to alert user about need to re-configure - Rewrite to use BOM data directly, remove WeatherZone as they are appear to no longer using BOM data - Use BOM places - Update settings to new Kodi format - Modernise code
